channel.title: [508] How to make yourself Owner/ Admin/ Mod [508]
channel.description:
Hello,
I am gonna show you how to make yourself Owner/ Admin/ Mod for a [u]508![/u]
It is actually very simple:
Go to your Server or Source (same thing)
Find [u]Data![/u]
Find [u]characters![/u]
To mak is simpler "server/ source"/ Data/ characters/ USERNAMEHERE
Now find your name or the persons you want, Open it up, with WordPad not NotePad! Search (CTRL + F) [code=java]rights[/code]
There will be something like this [code=java]......... rights = 0[/code] Change the 0 to
0 = Normal Player 1 = Mod 2 = Admin 3 = Owner (Sometimes it only goes to 2, but don't worry, admin has same abilities as owner)
I hope you enjoyed this guide.

item.description:
@neily00 wrote:

Hello,

I am gonna show you how to make yourself Owner/ Admin/ Mod for a 508!

It is actually very simple:

Go to your Server or Source (same thing)

Find Data!

Find characters!

To mak is simpler “server/ source”/ Data/ characters/ USERNAMEHERE

Now find your name or the persons you want,
Open it up, with WordPad not NotePad!
Search (CTRL + F)

There will be something like this

Change the 0 to

0 = Normal Player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner (Sometimes it only goes to 2, but don’t worry, admin has same abilities as owner)

I hope you enjoyed this guide.
